p:
The experiment of UV-C elicitation was performed using 4 weeks grown calli by following the protocol of Anjum et al.
29 . The UV-C radiations were applied on cultures at distance of 15 cm from Ultraviolet-C lamp (254 nm, Model ZQJ-254, China with value (intensity) of 3 W/m 2). The experimental Ultraviolet-C treatments (kJ/m 2) were calculated as;
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ {\text{UV-C dose}} = {\text{Intensity of Radiation }}\left( {{\text{W}}/{\text{m}}^{{2}} } \right) \times {\text{Exposure time of Cultures to UV-C}} $$\end{document}
UV-C dose
=

2
